content: I do not have access to real-time information to provide specific details. however, according to reports, the kachin state government has been building new highways and upgrading existing transportation routes, which may have improved access to healthcare and education facilities for local communities in certain areas. in addition, various organizations and ngos have worked to improve the infrastructure of schools and clinics, such as providing electricity and clean water. it is important to note that the impact of infrastructure developments on access to healthcare and education would depend on many factors, including the quality of the developments, the funding and support for maintaining and running the infrastructure, and the needs and preferences of local communities.
